Text: Had to delete the old torrent due to people stuck at 99% .......re check download with this one.....for last 1%

haha, I know exactly what happened, cos the same thing happenend to me :) You changed something in the textfile after creating the torrent...and then the size of the textfile wasn't correct anymore *lol* Anyway that's what I did, and that's the missing % I guess. I'm uploading now with another nick cos that was so embarresing :))

Actually frogman9 I didn't do that at all........upon creating the torrent a thumbs.db file was also created which is a hidden system file that can cause problems with torrents for some reason so I needed to create the torrent again after turning off the ability for windows to write these types of files to the cache.......................all fixed now so I aint got no embarressment to cope with........(",)
